Title: Repeals paragraph d of subdivision six of section 661 of the education law relating to the eligibility of incarcerated students for general or academic performance awards
Summary: Relates to incarcerated students' eligibility for general or academic performance awards.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph d of subdivision 6 of section 661 of the education law relating to the eligibility of incarcerated students for general or academic performance awards
